verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:41
verses.text: And with them Heman and Jeduthun, and the rest that were chosen, who were expressed by name, to give thanks to the Lord, because his mercy endureth for ever;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:42
verses.text: And with them Heman and Jeduthun with trumpets and cymbals for those that should make a sound, and with musical instruments of God. And the sons of Jeduthun were porters.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 16:43
verses.text: And all the people departed every man to his house: and David returned to bless his house.
